pullRequest.title: Consider top aggregate prototype when looking for aggregate spring bean.
pullRequest.bodyText: Without this change, it won't be possible to configure a spring component name for aggregate.

commit.message: Consider top aggregate prototype when looking for aggregate spring bean.

nodes.bodyText: I suppose this needs to be beanNamesForType.length != 1?
The name "prototype" is misleading, as this returns the name of the bean (which happens to be a prototype bean)
